ygData.subject: RE: My overcrowding solutuion
ygData.msgSnippet: Worse yet.  Plugh anyone?  Of course my problem now is programmers have gone too far the other way.  How about a variable called :
ygData.messageBody:
Worse yet. Plugh anyone? Of course my problem now is programmers have gone
too far the other way. How about a variable called :
PlaceHolderForSumofAssetsbyMonth

That's a real one in a recent program whose shortest variable name was 16
characters. Man was that code ugly!

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 27, 2000 2:09 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] My overcrowding solutuion


From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>

> I dont quite understand. Maybe I wasn't clear, I meant the widgets are
> on named all over the same dungeon, thus making pulling them to one room

Is that something like:

'I'd like to get ahold of *those* widgets'
'Or, check out the widgets on *that* <whistle>'

Everytime I hear the word widget, it brings back CS programming
nightmares. That and foo. Like any other three letter vairable
names, foo is used most often heh.

What widget do I get at foo level?

Harmonic.
